channel.title: CVE Feed for EnvoThemes -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for EnvoThemes -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-0766|2024-02-28T08:33:11.015Z -- envothemes -- Envo's Elementor Templates & Widgets for WooCommerce
item.description: The Envo's Elementor Templates & Widgets for WooCommerce plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the templates_ajax_request function in all versions up to, and including, 1.4.4. This makes it possible for subscribers and higher to create templates.

item.title: CVE-2024-0767|2024-02-28T08:33:13.010Z -- envothemes -- Envo's Elementor Templates & Widgets for WooCommerce
item.description: The Envo's Elementor Templates & Widgets for WooCommerce plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in versions up to, and including, 1.4.4. This is due to missing or incorrect nonce validation on the ajax_plugin_activation function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to activate arbitrary installed plugins via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.

item.title: CVE-2024-0768|2024-02-28T08:33:08.602Z -- envothemes -- Envo's Elementor Templates & Widgets for WooCommerce
item.description: The Envo's Elementor Templates & Widgets for WooCommerce plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in versions up to and including 1.4.4. This is due to missing or incorrect nonce validation on the ajax_theme_activation function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to activate arbitrary installed themes via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.

item.title: CVE-2024-4385|2024-05-16T11:05:28.188Z -- envothemes -- Envo Extra
item.description: The Envo Extra plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via multiple parameters in versions up to, and including, 1.8.16 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level permissions and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-32456|2024-04-17T09:57:13.361Z -- EnvoThemes -- Envo Extra
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in EnvoThemes Envo Extra allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Envo Extra: from n/a through 1.8.11.

item.title: CVE-2024-35167|2024-05-13T10:02:53.734Z -- EnvoThemes -- Envo's Elementor Templates & Widgets for WooCommerce
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in EnvoThemes Envo's Elementor Templates & Widgets for WooCommerce allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Envo's Elementor Templates & Widgets for WooCommerce: from n/a through 1.4.8.
